name: Abduction
effect: Draw 2 cards. You lose your Team Bonus until your next draw step.

name: Aggression
effect: If your fighter's Defense Value is greater than your opponent's fighter's Defense Value, discard all face-up attached cards in play.

name: Allure
effect: Your opponent must attack you on his next turn. If he cannot, and you have the Uraotogi Team Bonus, draw 4 cards.

name: Amanuma, the Gamer
effect:
(2) 0: Game Over: You can only use this attack if this character has 3 points of damage. Draw the bottom 5 cards from your Deck to deal this character 4 points of damage.
Effect: Main: Let's Play: You may search your Deck for a copy of Game Battler and attach it to this character without paying its Spirit Energy.

name: Apocalypse
effect: At the start of your next Draw Step, you win the game.

name: Ayame, Koenma's Assistant
effect:
(1) 4000: Control: If you have the Koenma Team Bonus, discard the top 4 cards of your Deck. If all the cards discarded this way were events, draw 2 cards.
Sideline Effect: Inform: If Koenma is in play, your opponent must play with the top card of his Deck face-up.

name: Bang!
effect: Name a card. Search your opponent's Deck for all copies of that card and discard them.

name: Big Brother
effect:
If you have the Toguro Team Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
While you have fewer cards in your hand then your opponent, your fighter's attacks gain +3000 Attack Value.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Blade Storm
effect:
If you have the Urameshi Team Bonus during setup, you may search your deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
You have no maximum Spirit Energy.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Botan, Pilot of the River Styx
effect:
(3) 2000: Guidance: This attack gains +500 ATK for each card in your Discard Pile and -500 ATK for each card in your opponent's discard pile.
Effect: Main: Guide: You may discard 1 event from your hand to search your deck for an event that doesn't require Spirit Energy and put it in your hand when this turn ends.

name: Botan, Wise Scholar?
effect:
(1) 3000: Spirit Guide: If this attack deals one or more points of damage to your opponent's fighter, you may take an item or technique attached to that fighter and attach it facedown to one of your Sidelined characters.
Sideline Effect: Main: Helping Hand: If the bottom card of your discard pile is an item or technique, pay 1 Spirit Energy to attach it facedown to one of your Sidelined characters.

name: Bull's-Eye
effect: When you draw your hand during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle to shuffle your hand into your Deck and draw 4 cards. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Butterfly Knife
effect: Your attacks gain +2000 Attack Value. If attached to Mitarai they gain +3000 Attack Value instead.

name: Champion Driver
effect: Discard all characters in the 5th Match Slots.

name: Clash of Champions
effect: If your fighter is a hero, you may search your Deck for an item and put it in your hand at the end of this turn. If your fighter is a villain, you may search your Deck for a technique instead.

name: Colorful Weapons
effect: This character's attacks gain +1000 Attack Value. If attached to a villain, this character's attacks gain +3000 instead.

name: Concealed Blade
effect: Take an additional turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game.

name: Consumer
effect: (2) 8000: If you have the Ichigaki Team Bonus, whenever this technique deals 1 or more points of damage, discard up to 2 attached cards in play.

name: Contemplate
effect:
If you have the Genkai Team Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
When you play a technique from your hand, your fighter’s attacks gains +1000 Attack Value for this turn.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Counter Strike
effect: Play this card when your fighter is dealt 1 or more points of damage by your opponent's fighter. If you haven't used a copy of Counter Strike in this match and if the fighter that damaged your fighter is still in the Arena at the end of this turn, deal your opponent’s fighter 1 point of damage.

name: Crazy World
effect: Play this card when your opponent makes you discard 3 or more cards from your Deck or hand at once. Deal 1 point of damage to your opponent's fighter. You can't play Crazy World for the rest of this turn.

name: Cruel Punishment
effect:
If you have less Spirit than your opponent, all of your attacks gain +3000 Attack Value until the end of your turn.
If you have the Koenma Team Bonus, shuffle 2 events that are not Cruel Punishment from your Discard Pile into your Deck.

name: Dark Encounter
effect: If you do not have a Team Bonus and your fighter has a Team Symbol, gain the Team Bonus matching that characters Team Symbol for the rest of the match.

name: Dark Gambit
effect: Discard a face-up item in play. Discard a card at random from your opponent's hand.

name: Dark Ritual
effect:
If you have the Sensui Team Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
When you would put an event under Gateway, you may put any one of your cards from your hand under Gateway instead.
Draw: You may put a card from your hand under Gateway.
Limit 1 per deck.

name: Darkness Approaches
effect:
Play this card to the Winner's Circle.
Whenever any of your card effects discard cards from your opponent's deck, those cards are put under this card face-down instead of being discarded.

name: Dazed and Confused
effect: Discard the top 5 cards of your Deck. For each item discarded in this way, your opponent discards the top 2 cards of his Deck.

name: Deadly Dice
effect: If Deadly Dice is discarded from your hand or Deck by an opponent's effect, draw 3 cards. If Deadly Dice is discarded from your hand or Deck by your effect, skip your next turn. Limit once per match.

name: Decoy
effect:
If you have the Masho Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and play it in the Winner's Circle.
All of your characters with 'Shinobi' in the title gain -2 Attack Cost, to a minimum of 1.
Main: Flip any of your Sidelined Characters face-up.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Demonic Strike
effect:
(2) 10,000: The next time you would draw 1 or more cards, subtract 1 card from the number of cards you are supposed to draw.
Effect: If you have the Saint Beasts Team Bonus, your attacks gain +1000 Attack Value for each card attached to your opponent's fighter. Double this bonus if your opponent has the Genkai Team Bonus.

name: Devastating Combination
effect:
(1) 4000: Choose another technique attached to this character. If that technique has an attack, add the attack's printed Attack Value to this attack.
Effect: All of your techniques cost 1 less Spirit Energy to play.

name: Discharge
effect:
(4) 13,000: Lose all your Spirit Energy.
Effect: When this character defeats your opponent's fighter, attach this card to a character on your Sideline.
Draw: Shuffle the bottom card from your Discard Pile into your Deck to gain 2 Spirit Energy.

name: Distractions
effect:
If you have the Saint Beasts Team Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
Once per turn, when you draw a card, you may discard a card from your hand to draw a card.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Double Block
effect:
If you have the Rokuyukai Team Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
All of your Rokuyukai characters don't pay to deal minimum damage.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Doushi, Raizen's Messenger
effect:
(2) 5000: Extend: You may attack one of your opponent's characters on his Sideline instead of attacking his fighter.
Effect: Main: Assist: Draw a card for each Team Leader your opponent has in play. If you have the Raizen Team Bonus, discard a card from your hand to draw a card for each Team Leader you have in play.

name: Elder Toguro, the Indestructible
effect:
(2) 4000: Pester: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent shuffles that card into his Deck and draws a card.
Sideline Effect: Main: Emergence: If you have the Toguro Team Bonus, draw a card.

name: Energy Release
effect:
(2) 6000: You may shuffle your deck.
Effect: Main: Gain 2 Spirit Energy.

name: Exterminate
effect: Put your opponent’s character in the 5th match slot face-down under your Gateway. If they don’t have a character in the 5th match slot, they choose one card from their hand and put it face-down under your Gateway.

name: Faces of Sensui
effect: If your fighter is a hero, gain 5 Spirit Energy. If your fighter is a villain, your opponent loses 5 Spirit Energy. If your fighter is a hero and a villain, you may also discard an attached card in play. Limit once per match.

name: Framed Memories
effect:
Items do not leave the Arena when characters switch Match Slots.
Main: Discard Framed Memories to gain 2 Spirit Energy.

name: Full Tilt
effect: If the only cards that you have played this turn increase your attack, and you have played 3 cards this turn that increase your attack, your attacks do 1 additional point of damage this turn. You cannot play any more cards this turn.

name: Game Battler
effect:
Attach this card to your Amanuma in play.
While attached, and when your opponent uses an attack, you may search your Deck for a card with “Mini Game” in the title and put it in your hand. If you do, you may immediately play a card with “Mini Game” in the title from your hand.
All cards with “Mini Game” in the title cost -5 Spirit Energy to play.

name: Gatasubal, Killing Machine
effect:
(1) 5000: Search and Destroy: Discard a face-up attached event in play to draw 2 cards.
(4) 12,000: Robotic Claws: This attack gains -2000 Attack Value for each attached card your opponent has in play. Draw a card.

name: Gateway
effect:
When you play this card put it face-up in the Winner's Circle.
At the end of your Draw Step, reveal your hand to your opponent and put an event from your hand under this card. Put all cards under this card face-down.
Draw: If there are 35 cards under this card, you win the game.

name: Gathering of Villains
effect: If all of your characters in play are villains, end all of your opponent's floating effects.

name: Genkai's Healing
effect: Heal one point of damage on a Sidelined character.

name: Genkai, Resurrected
effect:
(2) 12,000: Spirit Blast: You can only discard techniques to pay the cost of this attack.
Effect: Main: Resurrection: If Genkai, Resurrected is in your Winner's Circle, you may switch her with a character in your 5th Match Slot.

name: Going to Megallica
effect: Discard a facedown attached card, or attach this card to one of your opponent's characters in play. If attached to a character, that character cannot use any of its printed Sideline effects, and you discard this card when the match ends.

name: Guardians of the Human World
effect: Play this card when your opponent's villain attacks one of your characters. Deal your fighter 1 point of damage, and stop your opponent's attack and all of its effects.

name: Hagiri's Territory
effect: Main: Search your Deck for any card with 'Dice' or 'Hagiri' in the title and put that card on the top of your Deck.

name: Hagiri, The Hunter
effect: (3) 0: Stalk: If you discarded 3 Deadly Dice from your hand to pay for this attack, defeat your opponent’s fighter.

name: Hagiri, the Sniper
effect:
(4) 0: Sacrifice: Put all cards attached to Hagiri under Gateway. This character is now defeated.
Sideline Effect: Snipe: If Hagiri's Territory is in play, discard 3 cards attached to Hagiri to deal 1 point of damage to one of your opponent's characters. The Spirit Energy of all cards attaching to or are attached to this card cost +1 Spirit Energy.

name: Head-On Assault
effect: Your next attack gains +Attack Value equal to the difference between the Defense of your and your opponent's fighter.

name: Heroic Sacrifice
effect: For the rest of the match, all of your attacks gain +6000 Attack Value and -1 Attack Cost.

name: Heroic Strike
effect:
(1) 3000: If you have the Urameshi Team Bonus, this attack gains +500 to its Attack Value for each Spirit Energy you have.
Effect: Your attacks gain +2000 to their Attack Value.

name: Hiei's Peaceful Stance
effect: If you have 2 characters in play with the same Team Symbol and you don't have their Team Bonus, then for the rest of the match gain their Team Bonus in addition to any Team Bonus you already have.

name: Hiei's Tainted Glare
effect:
Attach this card to your Hiei, Dark Fighter.While attached, prevent 1 point of damage when this character is dealt damage.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Hiei, Dark Fighter
effect:
(1) 4000: Disintegrate: Gain 2 Spirit Energy and your opponent loses 2 Spirit Energy.
Effect: Main: Summoning: Discard a card from your hand to search your Deck for a card with 'Dragon' in the title.

name: Hiei, Determined Warrior
effect:
(1) 4500: Unleash: If you have more Spirit then your opponent, you may place the bottom card of your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.
(2) 7000: Dragon Rage: If you have less Spirit then your opponent, you may use this attack twice this turn.

name: Hiei, Enraged Demon
effect:
(2) 6000: Darkness: Your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.
Effect: Main: Disrupt: You may discard an item attached to this fighter to discard an item attached to your opponent's fighter.

name: Hostage
effect: Draw: If your opponent has a character in his 5th Match Slot and you do not, take your opponent's 5th match slot character and all of its attached cards and play it in your 5th Match Slot. You now control that character.

name: Huh???
effect: Discard 3 attached cards to have your opponent draw 2 cards.

name: Humans on the Hunt
effect: If both fighters are villains, draw a card for each hero your opponent has in play. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: I Got Something For You!
effect: Play this card in your Main Step to draw a card, or play this card when your opponent plays a card during your turn to stop all effects of that card.

name: Imposing Evil
effect:
If you have more villains in play than your opponent, draw 2 cards.
All of your attacks gain +2000 Attack Value until your next Draw Step.

name: Intensive Discipline
effect: Play this card on or after your second turn. If you didn't attack on your last turn, all of your attacks this turn are free.

name: Invasion
effect: Put 2 cards from your hand under Gateway. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Itsuki, Demon in Love
effect: (2) 5000: Love Effect: Trance: If you have the Sensui Team Bonus, all cards you discard to pay Attack Costs go under Gateway.

name: Jorge Satome, Blue Ogre
effect:
(4) 4000: Ogre Strike: This attack gains +1000 ATK for each point of damage on this character. If the bottom 4 cards of your Discard Pile are events, shuffle those cards into your Deck and draw 4 cards.
Sideline Effect: Royal Guard: If Jorge Satome is in either the Arena or Match Slots 2, 3, or 4 when Koenma is dealt damage, Jorge Satome, Blue Ogre may take the damage instead.

name: Kamiya's Territory
effect: Effect: Main: Discard Kamiya's Territory from play to search your Deck or Discard Pile for any card with 'Sensui' in the title or text box other than Kamiya’s Territory and put it in your hand. If attached to Kamiya, you don't discard this card to use this effect.

name: Kamiya, The Doctor
effect:
(2) 4000: Infect: This attack gains +2000 Attack Value for each card in your Discard Pile that heals.
Sideline Effect: Hospitalize: All of your cards that heal damage cost 0 Spirit Energy.

name: Kamiya, the Malicious
effect:
(1) 0: Mind Games: Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's Deck. This attack cannot deal minimum damage.
(3) 6000: Regenerate: If you have the Sensui Team Bonus, heal one point of damage on this character.

name: Kazuya's Pistol
effect: Your attacks gain +2000 Attack Value. Your opponent's attacks gain -1000 Attack Value. If attached to Sensui, Kazuya's Personality, all of your attacks gain -1 Attack Cost.

name: Kenko, Cute Healer
effect:
(1) 4000: Rejuvenate: Shuffle the bottom 10 cards of your Discard Pile into your deck.
Effect: Defensive Restraint: Your opponent may not use attacks with a printed Attack Value equal to or greater than Attack Value 5000.

name: King Yama
effect:
(3) 9000: Banish: All characters in play lose their Team Symbols for the rest of the match.
Effect: Main: Dismiss: You may discard 1 item and 1 event from your hand to search through your opponent's Deck and discard all of his characters in it.

name: Koenma's Cloud?
effect: You may discard this item at the beginning of your opponent's Attack Step to switch your fighter with a character on your Sideline. Limit 1 per deck.

name: Koenma's Pacifier
effect:
If you have the Koenma Team Bonus during setup, you may search your deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
When you attack, you may discard 2 cards from the top of your deck. For each event discarded in this way, your attacks gain +1500 ATK for this turn.
Limit 1 per deck.

name: Koenma, Disguised Leader
effect:
(1) 4000: Outsourcing: This attack does +1000 ATK for each point of damage of Jorge Satome, Blue Ogre.
Effect: Protection: Whenever Jorge Satome, Blue Ogre takes damage that was redirected from Koenma, shuffle 2 events from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Koenma, the Determined
effect:
(2) 8000: Risky Maneuver: Discard the top 2 cards from your Deck. This attack gains -2000 Attack Value for each event discarded in this way.
Effect: Attack: Spirit Boost: Pay up to 5 Spirit Energy. For each Spirit Energy paid, your attacks gain +1000 Attack Value for the rest of the turn.

name: Koenma, Young Ruler
effect:
(1) 0: Rule: This attack gains +5000 Attack Value for each Team Bonus you have.
Effect: Draw: In Command: If King Yama is in play or in the Winner's Circle, choose a Team Bonus. You gain that Team Bonus until your next Draw Step.
Sideline Effect: Authority: This character gains +4000 Defense for each Team Bonus you have.

name: Koorime, Guilty Conscience
effect:
(1) 0: Regret: This attack gains +2000 Attack Value for each character in play without a Team Symbol.
Sideline Effect: Built: If all of your characters in play have no Team Symbol, all of your attacks gain +2000 Attack Value and all of your characters in play gain +2000 Defense.

name: Kurama's Determination
effect: Search your Deck for any card with 'Yoko' or 'Kurama' in the text box and play it, without paying its Spirit.

name: Kurama's Tainted Glare
effect:
Attach this card to your Kurama, Legendary Fighter.While attached, prevent 1 point of damage when this character is dealt damage.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Kurama, Entrapped Demon
effect:
(1) 4000: Forgotten: For the rest of the match, when you use a card effect that discards cards from your hand, draw a card.
(1) 4000: Legend: Until the end of the match, when you use an effect that attaches an opponent's card to your fighter, draw a card.
(1) 4000: Revealed: Search your Deck or Discard Pile for Yoko and replace Kurama with him. Heal all damage on Yoko.

name: Kurama, Legendary Fighter
effect:
(1) 3500: Deplete: Gain 3 Spirit Energy and your opponent loses 3 Spirit Energy.
Effect: Attack: Kindness: You may discard 2 cards from your hand to take any 5 cards from your Discard Pile and put them at the bottom of your Deck.

name: Kurama, Skilled Assassin
effect:
(4) 8000: Assassinate: If you have more than 50 Spirit, all of your attacks gain +4000 Attack Value for the rest of the game.
Effect: Unlimted Energy: If you have more than 10 Spirit Energy, your attacks gain +5000 Attack Value. If you have more than 20 Spirit Energy, your attacks gain -3 Attack Cost. If you have more than 30 Spirit Energy, your attacks deal 1 additional point of damage. If you have more than 40 Spirit Energy, your attacks gain 'Discard your opponent's hand.'

name: Kuwabara's Tainted Glare
effect:
Attach this card to your Kuwabara, Emotional Fighter.While attached, prevent 1 point of damage when this character is dealt damage.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Kuwabara, Emotional Fighter
effect:
(1) 3000: Empower: Gain 4 Spirit Energy and your opponent loses 4 Spirit Energy.
Sideline Effect: Unite: When your opponent shuffles any cards into his Deck, you may shuffle the same number of cards into your Deck from your Discard Pile.

name: Kuwabara, Noble Champion
effect:
(1) 5000: Empower: If your opponent has a Team Bonus, draw 2 cards.
Sideline Effect: Main: Overlook: Discard the top card of your Deck. If the discarded card is a technique, discard a face-up attached card in play.

name: Kuwabara, Righteous Warrior
effect:
(1) 4000: United Strike: Your attacks gain +1000 Attack Value until your next Draw Step for each type of Team Symbol on your characters in the Winner's Circle.
Sideline Effect: Attack: Unite: You may discard 2 cards from your hand to draw a card for each type of Team Symbol that is on your characters in play.

name: Kuwabara, Righteous Warrior
effect:
(1) 4000: United Strike: Your attacks gain +1000 Attack Value until your next Draw Step for each type of Team Symbol on your characters in the Winner's Circle.
Sideline Effect: Attack: Unite: You may discard 2 cards from your hand to draw a card for each type of Team Symbol that is on your characters in play.

name: Lamp Weed
effect: This character gains +2000 Defense Value. Your opponent may not play cards that switch his fighter with a character on his Sideline.

name: Liquid Drill
effect:
Discard 1 copy of Darkness Approaches from the Winner's Circle. All cards already under Darkness Approaches stay in the Winner's Circle.
Your fighter gains +2000 Defense Value for the rest of the match for each copy of Liquid Rush in your Discard Pile.

name: Liquid Guardian
effect:
(2) 8000: Choose one of your attacks. Until the end of your next turn, that attack has no effect.
Effect: All of your attacks without effects gain +3000 Attack Value.

name: Liquid Rush
effect:
Your fighter gains +2000 Defense Value for the rest of the match.
Your fighter gains +2000 Attack Value for the rest of the match for each copy of Liquid Drill in your discard pile.

name: M2, Ryo
effect:
(1) 5000: Diversion: Discard a face-up item in play.
Sideline Effect: Invisible Strike: If you have the Ichigaki Team Bonus and have more attached cards in play than your opponent, all of your attacks gain -1 Attack Cost to a minimum of 0.

name: M3, Kai
effect: (2) 4000: Demolish: You may discard a card from your hand to choose an attack on one of your characters in play with the Ichigaki Team Symbol and add the chosen attack’s printed ATK to this attack.

name: M4, Spineless Demon
effect:
(1) 1000: Harass: Discard an attached card on one of your opponent's characters in play to discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck.
(2) 2000: Elude: If you have the Ichigaki Team Bonus and if you have 5 or more cards attached to your characters, heal 1 point of damage on this character.

name: Mad Bomb
effect: Discard this item after dealing damage from an attack. If you dealt 2 or more points of damage, discard all attached cards in the Arena. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Madness
effect: Switch the amount of Spirit Energy you have with the amount of Spirit Energy your opponent has.

name: Mafuuken
effect: (2) 4: If you have the Koenma Team Bonus, all bonuses to this attack reduce your opponent's Defense Value by that amount instead of adding to this attack. Your opponent's Defense Value has a minimum of 1. While in your Discard Pile, this card counts as an event.

name: Makihara, Gourmet
effect:
(2) 6000: Entangle: Choose a card in your opponent's hand. Your opponent discards the chosen card.
Sideline Effect: Predict: Your opponent must play with his hand face-up on the table.

name: Malevolent Glare
effect:
No player can heal for the rest of the match.
If this card is discarded for the Toguro Team Bonus, draw a card.

name: Malice
effect: If your fighter is a villain and your opponent's fighter is a hero, your opponent's fighter gains -3000 Defense until your next Draw Step.

name: Meditation
effect:
(0) 0: Search your Deck for a copy of Gateway and put it in your hand.
Effect: Main: Gain 2 Spirit Energy.

name: Metamorphose
effect:
If you have the Sarayashki Team Bonus, discard 2 cards at random from your hand. For each item discarded in this way, your attacks gain +3000 Attack Value until your next Draw Step.
Your Attack Costs gain -1 Attack Cost for the rest of the match.

name: Mini Game, Action Battle
effect: Play when your opponent uses an attack to cancel all effects and damage of that attack. Each player searches his or her deck for a character and discards it. The player who discarded the character with the highest Defense deals 1 point of damage to his opponent's fighter (no damage is dealt for ties). Limit once per game.

name: Mini Game, Flight Shooter
effect: Play this card when your opponent uses an attack to cancel all effects and damage from that attack. Choose a card type. Both players discard the top 5 cards of their Decks. The player who discarded the highest number of cards of that type in those 5 cards deals 1 point of damage to his opponent's fighter. If there is a tie, no damage is dealt. Limit once per match. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Mini Game, Master Quiz
effect: Play when your opponent uses an attack to cancel all effects and damage from that attack. Name 5 cards. Your opponent must tell you the Spirit Energy of the 5 chosen cards. If your opponent doesn't know the Spirit Energy of 3 or more of the named cards, his fighter takes 1 point of damage. If he knows the Spirit Energy of 3 or more of the named cards, then your fighter takes 1 point of damage. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Mini Game, Tennis
effect: Play when your opponent uses an attack to cancel all effects and damage from that attack. Discard the top card of your Deck. You and your opponent reveal one card from your hands. The player who revealed the card with the card number closest to the one on the discarded card deals his opponent 1 point of damage. If there is a tie, no damage is dealt. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Mitamura, the Master
effect:
(1) 3000: Discipline: This attack gains +1000 Attack Value for each card attached to this fighter.
Sideline Effect: Enlighten: If you have the Ichigaki Team Bonus, your opponent can only attach up to two cards per turn.

name: Mitarai, Misguided
effect: (2) 4000: Liquid Probe: If you have Darkness Approaches face-up in the Winner’s Circle, search your opponent's Deck for any card and put it under Darkness Approaches.

name: Mitrai, The Seaman
effect:
(1) 5500: Fishing: Search your Deck for a card with 'Water' or 'Liquid' or 'Fish' or 'Fishing' in the title and put it on the top of your Deck.
(3) 12,000: Tsunami

name: Morbid
effect: Put all characters in the Winner's Circle under Gateway. These characters cannot be used for Sudden Death.

name: Murota, Mind Reader
effect:
(2) 6000: Right Hook: Choose a card in your opponent's hand and put it at the bottom of his Deck to have him draw a card.
Sideline Effect: Predict: Your opponent must play with his hand face-up on the table.

name: Natural Reaction
effect: All of your attacks gain +1500 Attack Value for each point of damage on your fighter until your next Draw Step.

name: Palm Block
effect:
(1) 4500: If your opponent attacks you during his next Attack Step, draw a card at the end of that turn.
Effect: This character's attacks gain +1500 Attack Value.

name: Panic
effect: Play this card when your opponent would use a card effect to gain Spirit Energy. Your opponent now loses that much Spirit Energy instead of gaining it. You now gain that much Spirit Energy.

name: Possessed
effect: Attach this card to your opponent's fighter. While this card is attached to that fighter, you can use any attacks printed on the attached character.

name: Protecting The Innocent
effect: If all of your characters in play are heroes, end all of your opponent's floating effects.

name: Recall
effect: Both players lose all their Team Bonuses for the rest of the match.

name: Rubber Slam
effect: When Rubber Slam comes in play or flips face-up, it copies one of your techniques in play. If you have the Genkai Team Bonus, then Rubber Slam copies any technique or item in play instead.

name: Sasuga, Enchantress
effect:
(1) 3000: Annoy: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent discards the chosen card and draws a card. If Rinku is in play, draw a card.
Effect: Cuteness: Your opponent's fighter thinks this character is so cute that his attacks gain -2000 Attack Value. Rinku cannot use any attacks against this character.

name: Sayaka, the Investigator
effect:
(5) 1000: Taking Notes: Your opponent discards his hand. Draw a card for each event your opponent discarded in this way.
Sideline Effect: Main: Investigate: If you have the Koenma Team Bonus and the bottom card of your Discard Pile is an event, you may discard an event from your hand to draw the bottom card of your Discard Pile.

name: Sensui's Energy Sphere
effect:
If you have the Sensui Team Bonus and your Gateway is in the Winner's Circle, take the bottom card of your Discard Pile and put it under Gateway for each character you have in play that is both a hero and a villain.
You may search your Deck for Gateway and put it in your hand.

name: Sensui, Dark Detective
effect:
(0) 3000: Equalizer: If all damage on all of your characters in play is greater than all damage on all of your opponent's characters in play, your opponent's fighter takes one point of damage.
Sideline Effect: Justice: When a player's character is dealt points of damage from an opponent's attack, that player draws 2 cards.

name: Sensui, Kazuya's Personality
effect:
(2) 5000: Evilness: Draw a card.
Effect: Main: Swap: Exchange a card in your hand for any card under Gateway.
Sideline Effect: Preparation: This character gains +200 Defense Value for each card under Gateway.

name: Sensui, Spirit Detective
effect: (2) 5500: Righteous Strike: If your opponent's fighter is a villain and this attack deals damage, this attack deals +1 point of damage.

name: Sinister Slash
effect:
(1) 4000: This attack gains +1000 ATK for each point of damage on your opponent's Sidelined characters.
Effect: Your attacks gain +1000 ATK. Your attacks gain an additional +2000 ATK when attacking Sidelined characters.

name: Sinister Trap
effect: Play this card when your opponent's hero attacks one of your characters. Take 1 point of damage, and stop your opponent's attack and all of its effects.

name: Sinning Tree
effect: Draw: You may discard this technique to discard up to 2 face-up attached cards in play. If you discarded 2 items in this way, draw 2 cards at the end of this turn.

name: Smoke Screen Catalyst
effect:
If you have the Uraotogi Team Bonus, attach this card to a character with the Uraotogi Team Symbol.
While attached or until your next Draw Step, all of your characters in play with the Uraotogi Team Symbol gain -1 Attack Cost to a minimum of 0.

name: Sorrow
effect:
If you have the Ichigaki Team Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
Whenever you discard one of your opponent's cards from play, your fighter gains +1000 Attack Value for the rest of the match.
Limit 1 per deck.

name: Spectacular Battle
effect: For the rest of the match, all of your attacks gain +3000 Attack Value, and your fighter takes one point of damage every time you do not use an attack in your Attack Step.

name: Spirit Tornado
effect:
(1) 4000: Your opponent loses 2 Spirit Energy and you gain 2 Spirit Energy.
Effect: While attached, your attacks gain +2000 ATK.

name: Splinter-Resshuuken
effect:
(1) 3000: This attack gains +1000 Attack Value for each card in your opponent's hand.
Effect: While attached, this character gains +1500 Defense.

name: Stop it!
effect: Play when your opponent uses an attack. Your characters in play gain +2000 Defense for the rest of the turn. If you have the Rokuyukai Team Bonus, draw 2 cards.

name: Surprised
effect: Assign your fighter's damage to the Arena and your characters' damage to their match slots. If you have the Masho Team Bonus, turn all of your cards face down and rearrange them in any legal way you want. Flip your fighter and all attached cards in the Arena face-up for free. All characters now transfer the damage in their spaces to them.

name: Tag Team
effect:
If you dealt your opponent's fighter minimum damage in your last Attack Step and you deal minimum damage to that fighter this turn, your opponent takes 2 points of damage.
Gain 3 Spirit Energy.

name: Taking Aim
effect: Shuffle 10 of your cards from under your opponent's Darkness Approaches or Gateway into your Deck. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Team Sensui Appears
effect:
If all your characters in play are both heroes and villains, search your Deck or Discard Pile for a copy of Gateway and play it.
All your attacks gain +2000 Attack Value for the rest of the turn.

name: Test of Champions
effect: Discard all items in the Arena. Limit once per match. Limit one per Deck.

name: The Arrival
effect: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck to your opponent. Your opponent can choose to either place 2 of those cards in your hand and discard the other 3, or to deal one of his characters one point of damage to discard all five cards. Limit 1 per deck.

name: The Chapter Black
effect:
If attached to a hero, all of your attacks gain +1000 Attack Value. If attached to a villain, all of your attacks gain +1500 Attack Value.
Main: Gain 2 Spirit Energy.

name: Tiny Guardian
effect:
Effect: Techniques do not leave the Arena when fighters switch with another character.
Main: You may discard Tiny Guardian from play to draw a card.

name: Torture
effect:
If you have the Uraotogi Team Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
For each card in your opponent's hand less than six, your attacks gain +1000 Attack Value.
Limit 1 per deck.

name: Tough Love
effect:
(1) 5500: If you used this attack last turn you may attack a character on your opponent's Sideline instead of attacking his fighter.
Effect: While attached, this character gains +1000 Defense for each point of damage on your opponent's fighter.

name: Tracking Device
effect: Your opponent cannot switch characters. If you have the Sarayashki Bonus, your other items cannot be discarded from play. You may only have one Tracking Device in the Arena.

name: Ura-Otoko
effect: (1) 5000: A player of your choice discards one of their face-up attached cards in play. That player may use this effect immediately.

name: Viral Demon Insects
effect: Play after your opponent heals any points of damage from his card effect. Deal that character two points of damage. Limit once per turn.

name: Virus Carriers
effect: If your fighter is a villain and your opponent has a hero in play, deal 1 point of damage to one of his heroes in play. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Weapon of Destruction
effect: Discard this card at the end of your turn. If you have the Toguro Team Bonus, and you have no cards in your hand, draw cards until you have the same number of cards in hand as your opponent.

name: Wet Shirt
effect: Players cannot heal points of damage and can only play 2 cards during their Main Step. Limit 1 per Deck.

name: What Friends Are For
effect:
If you have the Sarayashki Team Bonus during setup, you may search your Deck for this card and put it in the Winner's Circle.
When you use the Sarayashki Team Bonus to search your Deck for an item, you may pay one Spirit to search your Deck for an item, reveal it, and then attach it to one of your Sidelined characters.
Limit 1 per deck.

name: Whip Mastery
effect:
(2) 6500: Reveal your hand to your opponent. Your attacks gain +1000 Attack Value until your next Draw Step for each card you have in your hand with 'Whip' in the title.
Effect: If attached to Yoko or Kurama, your attacks gain +1000 Attack Value, and attacks with 'Whip' in the title gain -1 Attack Cost to a minimum of 1 Attack Cost.

name: Wicked Grin
effect: If you have the Koenma Team Bonus, then for the rest of the turn, shuffle 3 cards from your Discard Pile other than Wicked Grin into your Deck for each point of damage dealt from your attacks to your opponent's characters.

name: Younger Itsuki, Detective's Assistant
effect:
(2) 6500: Shock: You may discard a face-up item attached to this character to switch your fighter with a character on your Sideline at the end of this turn.
Sideline Effect: Draw: Stealth: You may discard 2 cards from your hand to switch this character with your fighter.

name: Yusuke's Tainted Glare
effect:
Attach this card to your Yusuke, Noble Fighter.While attached, prevent 1 point of damage when this character is dealt damage.
If you have 4 cards in play with 'Tainted Glare' in the title, you win the game.
Limit 1 per Deck.

name: Yusuke, Entranced
effect:
(1) 3000: Well Equipped: If Yusuke has more items attached than your opponent's fighter, you can use this attack a second time this turn.
Effect: Hoard: Yusuke does not pay Spirit Energy for items when he enters the Arena.

name: Yusuke, Noble Fighter
effect:
(1) 4500: Focus: Gain 1 Spirit and your opponent loses 1 Spirit Energy.
Effect: Draw: Unpredictable: You may shuffle the bottom 2 cards of your Discard Pile into your Deck and discard 2 cards at random from your hand to draw the bottom 2 cards of your Deck.

name: Yusuke, Raizen's Successor
effect:
(1) 5000: Conquer: This attack gains +1000 Attack Value for each character on your opponent's Sideline.
Effect: Demon Energy: When this character takes 1 or more points of damage during your opponent's turn, draw 2 cards.

name: Yuu, Bookworm
effect:
(2) 7500: Outwit: You may discard 2 techniques attached to this fighter to switch him with a character on your Sideline at the end of your turn.
Effect: Grand Entrance: When this character becomes a fighter, discard the top 4 cards of your Deck. Attach any techniques discarded in this way to this character without paying their Spirit Energy.
